item.description:
Do you share all of yourself with others and feel tired or depleted? 

Do you need time and space for yourself, but don’t have the time or money to take a trip or spend a day at the spa?

Is your life the way you want it to be or do you want create more opportunities and possibilities for yourself in your life?

I invite you to join our Women’s Group so that you can care for yourself and get in touch with your own needs while being supported, nurtured and loved.  This group will allow you the time to sit quietly and also share anything that matters to you in a sacred, safe and confidential space.

Creating a sacred community means there is an agreement present to hold each other and the community itself as sacred.  What is shared or spoken is done in a sacred manner.  As we listen to one another, we do so in a sacred way.  There is no judgment or criticism present.  We are able to listen whole heartedly to what each woman has to say, holding her in support and compassion, receiving her in wholeness. 

Our Sacred Process:

·        Before we begin we will cleanse and clear allowing us to release the day and become fully present in our community.

  •  We will create our own special intention

·   Each woman will have the opportunity to introduce herself to the group (as the community listens without interruption) and share what feels right such as personal hopes, dreams, fears and/or what attracted her to the group.

·         We will decide what activities or discussion we want to have

·         We will end and seal our time together with guided imagery and meditation.

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Women's Group - Helping Women Connect to Themselves To Create A Life They Love
